newsitem.title: UK: EIB sets $1.0 billion 30-year zero-coupon bond.
newsitem.headline: EIB sets $1.0 billion 30-year zero-coupon bond.

text.p: The following bond was announced by lead manager Salomon Brothers.
TYPE STRAIGHT ISS PRICE 13.362 PAY DATE 06.NOV.96
MOODY AAA LISTING LUX PAY FREQ =
S&P AAA DENOMS (K) 10-100-1M SALE LIMITS US/UK
NEG PLG YES CRS DEFLT YES FORCE MAJ IPMA 2
GOV LAW ENGLISH HOME CTRY = TAX PROVS =
MGT/UND 10 BP SELL CONC 20 BP PRAECIP =
